title: Hanging Lamp, ca. 1930
dimensions: H x diam.: 68.6 x 68.6 cm (27 x 27 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through the gift of Mary A. Hearn, William Hindley, R.H. Hunt, James Hazen Hyde, Mrs. Richard Irvin, and Mrs. Talbot J. Taylor
description: Glass hanging lamp in the form of a many-pointed star, the points of varying lengths. Each point cut and etched with angular geometric patterns. Housed in a metal strapwork frame suspended from a metal chain.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging Lamp, ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Glass, metal. Museum purchase through the gift of Mary A. Hearn, William Hindley, R.H. Hunt, James Hazen Hyde, Mrs. Richard Irvin, and Mrs. Talbot J. Taylor. 1968-94-1.
